name: Downlink for lora and update HA
TTN - app-01
TTN - app-02
url's for mqtt integration
info:
https://www.home-assistant.io/integrations/mqtt/


==== The options are implemented ====

https://www.home-assistant.io/integrations/sensor/
https://www.home-assistant.io/integrations/sensor.mqtt/

https://www.home-assistant.io/integrations/binary_sensor/
https://www.home-assistant.io/integrations/binary_sensor.mqtt/

https://www.home-assistant.io/integrations/switch/
https://www.home-assistant.io/integrations/switch.mqtt/



==== Following are not yet implemented and probably there are more options ====

https://www.home-assistant.io/integrations/climate/
https://www.home-assistant.io/integrations/climate.mqtt/

https://www.home-assistant.io/integrations/valve/
https://www.home-assistant.io/integrations/valve.mqtt/


==== diagnostics data ====
https://community.home-assistant.io/t/entity-category-mqtt-diagnostic-and-config/609731


==== icons ====
https://pictogrammers.com/library/mdi/

name: Settings to flow variable (flow.set)
push haConfigQueue to mqtt
push haValueQueue to mqtt
Collect all data
collect device topic and distribute values to the correct integration
process integration "sensor"
process integration "binary_sensor"
process integration "switch"
process integration "climate"
process integration "number"
process integration "button"
in memory for debug
func:
msg.payload.topic = msg.topic

msg.deviceName = msg.topic.split("/")[3]

flow.set("last_msg_" + msg.deviceName, msg.payload)

return msg;

name: device 5
func:
var deviceName = "eui-70############d5"

msg.payload = flow.get("last_msg_" + deviceName)
msg.topic = msg.payload.topic

return msg;
